House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00050
FULL TITLE : LOCAL EXECUTIVE POWER OVER THE POLICE
SHORT TITLE : Alleged Harassment Of Phil. National Police Director Against Him
ABSTRACT : Alleging that the governor of Negros Oriental had been using the provincial police director to harass his political opponents, Rep. Teves said that the former relieved several police chiefs for no reason at all and without offering the mayors concerned with several replacements for the same and planned to implicate him with possession of illegal drugs and firearms in his residence. He also alleged that the governor was using said police director to operate his money-making schemes...; called for an investigation into the illegal activities in his province and requested PNP Regional Dir.Conrad Capa to immediately relieve police Provincial Dir. Nestor Tiempo from his post as the mandate of the police is to protect the people and not to be a partisan to a provincial governor. (House Journal No.13,p.13)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TEVES, ARNOLFO JR. A.
